text: Vittoria Avanzini (born 8 February 1915, date of death unknown) was an Italian gymnast. She competed in the women's artistic team all-around event at the 1936 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1915 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Italian female artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Italy Category:Gymnasts at the 1936 Summer Olympics Category:People from Busto Arsizio
title: Vittoria Avanzini
